data.message: Eminem you actually are a legend 💪 he helped me get through so much. Big Up💪☝️

replies.message: You look about 12. The only thing you should have gone through by now is junior school.
And you look about 50. The only thing you've gone through is netto on your weekly shop looking for another scrubby green shirt to wear for your profile picture. So good one😂👏

Seriously..when I was just 8 my brother died..mom and dad would treat me like shit.. Other brother was diagnosed with a malignant brain tumor...I was going through tough times...theres no specific age you have to hit to start going through pain
It's Oxfam mate, we dont have a Netto near us.

Don't listen to them Harvey mate!!!

If you want to see Eminem live, wait of course you do!!!

Then sign this petition for him to do another UK tour, could be his last gig ever!!!

Sign and share!!!

Let's make this happen!!!

 https://www.change.org/p/marshall-mathers-eminem-me-and-many-others-would-love-it-if-you-could-do-one-last-tour-in-the-uk-as-thousands-of-us-missed-your-two-night-stint-at-wembley-in-2014-we-just-want-one-last-chance-to-see-a-rap-legend-live-before-you-leave-the-game-for-goo?recruiter=350307000&utm_source=share_petition&utm_medium=copylink&rp_sharecordion_checklist=control
wtf /\ pmsl. yeh like a petition will work. It isn't the government you're dealing with.
Throwing out Iggy's bitch ass in this track and Meek Mill. Stupid motha fuckas. lol FREESTYLE x FRIDAY https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mln05CpHNKU
